languages.text:
This maul's Shove attack costs 1 AP.
It also has AoE version of Shove for 2 AP.

traits.locale_text:
This maul's Shove attack costs 1 AP.
It also has AoE version of Shove for 2 AP.

languages.text:
This maul's {g|f: bd5f109c46684a09b07fb13743d2a6d7}Harsh Shove{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costs 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
Additionally, the wielder can use {g|f:0ff8e6e3f2ac4b94a24ef8623d286084}Shoving Strike{/g}, costing 2 AP, against multiple enemies in an area.
languages.original_text:
{g|f: bd5f109c46684a09b07fb13743d2a6d7}Оттесняющий удар{/g} этой булавой требует 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.
Также персонаж может применять {g|f:0ff8e6e3f2ac4b94a24ef8623d286084}Отбрасывающий удар{/g}, требующий 2 ОД, против нескольких противников в области.

traits.locale_text: This maul's Shove ability costs 1 AP. Additionally, the wielder can spend 2 AP to use Shove against multiple enemies in the area.

This maul's {g|f: bd5f109c46684a09b07fb13743d2a6d7}Harsh Shove{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costs 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
Additionally, the wielder can use {g|f:0ff8e6e3f2ac4b94a24ef8623d286084}Shoving Strike{/g}, costing 2 AP, against multiple enemies in an area.

Additionally, the wielder can use {g|f:0ff8e6e3f2ac4b94a24ef8623d286084}Shoving Strike{/g}, costing 2 AP, against multiple enemies in an area.

languages.text:
Bu tokmağın {g|f: bd5f109c46684a09b07fb13743d2a6d7}Sert Kakış{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcar.
Ayrıca kullanan kişi, bir alandaki birden çok düşmana karşı {g|f:0ff8e6e3f2ac4b94a24ef8623d286084}Kakan Atak{/g} kabiliyetini (2 EP harcar) kullanabilir.

languages.text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} {g|f: bd5f109c46684a09b07fb13743d2a6d7}Empujón brutal{/g} de esta maza cuesta 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
Además, el portador puede usar {g|f:0ff8e6e3f2ac4b94a24ef8623d286084}Golpe de rechazo{/g} (por 2 PA) contra varios enemigos en una zona.
languages.original_text:

Additionally, the wielder can use {g|f:0ff8e6e3f2ac4b94a24ef8623d286084}Shoving Strike{/g}, costing 2 AP, against multiple enemies in an area.

traits.locale_text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} {g|f: bd5f109c46684a09b07fb13743d2a6d7}Empujón brutal{/g} de esta maza cuesta 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
Además, el portador puede usar {g|f:0ff8e6e3f2ac4b94a24ef8623d286084}Golpe de rechazo{/g} (por 2 PA) contra varios enemigos en una zona.

La {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} {g|f: bd5f109c46684a09b07fb13743d2a6d7}Empujón brutal{/g} de esta maza cuesta 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
Además, el portador puede usar {g|f:0ff8e6e3f2ac4b94a24ef8623d286084}Empujón impactante{/g} por 2 PA contra múltiples enemigos en su área de efecto.

La {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} {g|f: bd5f109c46684a09b07fb13743d2a6d7}Empujón brutal{/g} de esta maza cuesta 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.

languages.text:
这把大锤的{g|f: bd5f109c46684a09b07fb13743d2a6d7}暴力推搡{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}消耗1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
除此之外，装备者可以消耗2点行动点数，对范围内多名敌人使用{g|f:0ff8e6e3f2ac4b94a24ef8623d286084}推搡打击{/g}这一能力。

This maul's {g|f: bd5f109c46684a09b07fb13743d2a6d7}Harsh Shove{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costs 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
Additionally, the wielder can use {g|f:0ff8e6e3f2ac4b94a24ef8623d286084}Shoving Strike{/g}, costing 2 AP, against multiple enemies in an area.

traits.locale_text:
这把大锤的{g|f: bd5f109c46684a09b07fb13743d2a6d7}暴力推搡{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}消耗1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
除此之外，装备者可以消耗2点行动点数，对范围内多名敌人使用{g|f:0ff8e6e3f2ac4b94a24ef8623d286084}推搡打击{/g}这一能力。

这把大锤的{g|f: bd5f109c46684a09b07fb13743d2a6d7}暴力推搡{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}消耗1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
除此之外，装备者可以消耗2点行动点数，对范围内多名敌人使用{g|f:0ff8e6e3f2ac4b94a24ef8623d286084}推搡打击{/g}这一能力。

languages.text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} {g|f: bd5f109c46684a09b07fb13743d2a6d7}Forte poussée{/g} de cette masse coûte 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
De plus, l'utilisateur peut utiliser {g|f:0ff8e6e3f2ac4b94a24ef8623d286084}Bousculade{/g}, coûtant 2 PA, contre plusieurs ennemis d'une zone.

traits.locale_text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} {g|f: bd5f109c46684a09b07fb13743d2a6d7}Forte poussée{/g} de cette masse coûte 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
De plus, l'utilisateur peut utiliser {g|f:0ff8e6e3f2ac4b94a24ef8623d286084}Bousculade{/g}, coûtant 2 PA, contre plusieurs ennemis d'une zone.

La {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} {g|f: bd5f109c46684a09b07fb13743d2a6d7}Forte poussée{/g} de cette masse coûte 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
De plus, le porteur peut utiliser {g|f:0ff8e6e3f2ac4b94a24ef8623d286084}Frappe repoussante{/g}, qui coûte 2 PA, contre plusieurs ennemis de la zone.

La {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} {g|f: bd5f109c46684a09b07fb13743d2a6d7}Forte poussée{/g} de cette masse coûte 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
De plus, le porteur peut utiliser {g|f:0ff8e6e3f2ac4b94a24ef8623d286084}Frappe repoussante{/g}, qui coûte 2 PA, contre plusieurs ennemis de la zone.

languages.text:
このモールの{g|f: bd5f109c46684a09b07fb13743d2a6d7}激しい突進{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}コストは1{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}。
さらに、使用者は範囲内の複数の敵に対して、2APを消費して{g|f:0ff8e6e3f2ac4b94a24ef8623d286084}突き飛ばし{/g}を使用できる。

Additionally, the wielder can use {g|f:0ff8e6e3f2ac4b94a24ef8623d286084}Shoving Strike{/g}, which costs 2 AP against multiple enemies in an area.

languages.text:
Die {g|f: bd5f109c46684a09b07fb13743d2a6d7}Unwirscher Stoß{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kostet 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
Außerdem kann der Träger für 2 AP {g|f:0ff8e6e3f2ac4b94a24ef8623d286084}Drängender Hieb{/g} gegen mehrere Gegner in einem Bereich einsetzen.
